abstract: Grocery store owners William and Esperanza Casco were making enough money to stay current on their mortgage, but when JPMorgan Chase & Co. offered a plan that reduced their payments, they figured they could use the extra cash and signed up.
snippet: Grocery store owners William and Esperanza Casco were making enough money to stay current on their mortgage, but when JPMorgan Chase & Co. offered a plan that reduced their payments, they figured they could use the extra cash and signed up.
lead_paragraph: William and Esperanza Casco, grocery store owners, were making enough money to stay current on their mortgage, but when JPMorgan Chase offered a plan that reduced their payments, they figured they could use the extra cash and signed up.

headline.main: Homeowners Say Loan Modifications Led to Foreclosure
